promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic epic fox grass-type pokemon with green runic fur. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdurune, a a dynamic epic fox grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Impact Blow, Paradise Pollen. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "grass" or "Verdurune". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, fox-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: This dynamic forest dweller gracefully leaps between trees. It uses Impact Blow to fell fruits, then uses Paradise Pollen to regrow them instantly.
